title: Episode 506 - Billy Gibbons
itunes:title: Episode 506 - Billy Gibbons
description:
ZZ Top founder Billy Gibbons details the journey of a band that has been together for nearly 45 years, with beards and without. Billy tells Marc what he learned opening for Jimi Hendrix, how he made a guitar out of Muddy Waters's house, and what he thought of ZZ Top's huge commecial success in the 1980s.

Sign up here for WTF+ to get the full show archives and weekly bonus material! https://plus.acast.com/s/wtf-with-marc-maron-podcast.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
